scripts.electron:dev: npm run dev & cd electron && npm run dev
scripts.electron:build: cross-env ELECTRON_BUILD=true npm run build && cd electron && npm run build
scripts.electron:build:win: cross-env ELECTRON_BUILD=true npm run build && cd electron && npm run build:win
scripts.electron:build:mac: cross-env ELECTRON_BUILD=true npm run build && cd electron && npm run build:mac
scripts.electron:build:linux: cross-env ELECTRON_BUILD=true npm run build && cd electron && npm run build:linux
